enumDescriptions.RedfishSessionAuth: Requests using Redfish Session Authentication are allowed.
enumDescriptions.AuthNone: Requests without any sort of authentication are allowed.
enumDescriptions.OemAuth: Requests using OEM authentication mechanisms are allowed.
enumDescriptions.BasicAuth: Requests using HTTP Basic Authentication are allowed.

enumDescriptions.NetworkHostInterface: This interface is a Network Host Interface.

KernelAuthEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether kernel authentication for this interface is enabled.
KernelAuthEnabled.description: This indicates whether this kernel authentication is enabled for this interface.

InterfaceEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this interface is enabled.
InterfaceEnabled.description: This indicates whether this interface is enabled.

KernelAuthRoleId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the ID of the Role resource that is configured for kernel authentication on this interface.
KernelAuthRoleId.description: This property contains the Role for kernel authentication on this interface.

FirmwareAuthRoleId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the ID of the Role resource that is configured for firmware authentication on this interface.
FirmwareAuthRoleId.description: This property contains the Role for firmware authentication on this interface.

FirmwareAuthEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether firmware authentication for this interface is enabled.
FirmwareAuthEnabled.description: This indicates whether this firmware authentication is enabled for this interface.

NetworkProtocol.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain a reference to a resource of type ManagerNetworkProtocol which represents the network services for this Manager.
NetworkProtocol.description: This is a reference to the network services and their settings that the Manager controls.  It is here that clients will find network configuration options as well as network services.

HostEthernetInterfaces.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a collection of type EthernetInterfaceCollection that Computer Systems use as the Host Interface to this Manager.
HostEthernetInterfaces.description: This is a reference to a collection of NICs that Computer Systems use for network communication with this Host Interface.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.
Oem.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.
Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.

AuthenticationModes.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array consisting of the authentication modes allowed on this interface.
AuthenticationModes.description: This indicates the authentication modes available on this interface.

ExternallyAccessible.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this interface is accessible by external (non-host) entities.
ExternallyAccessible.description: This indicates whether this interface is accessible by external entities.

HostInterfaceType.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an enumeration describing type of the interface.
HostInterfaceType.description: This indicates the Host Interface type for this interface.

ManagerEthernetInterface.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a resource of type EthernetInterface which represents the network interface used by this Manager as the HostInterface.
ManagerEthernetInterface.description: This is a reference to a single NIC that this Manager uses for network communication with this Host Interface.

Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.
Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.

FirmwareAuthRole.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a Role object instance, and should reference the object identified by property FirmwareAuthRoleId.
FirmwareAuthRole.description: A reference to the Role object defining Privileges for this Host Interface when using firmware authentication.

KernelAuthRole.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a Role object instance, and should reference the object identified by property KernelAuthRoleId.
KernelAuthRole.description: A reference to the Role object defining Privileges for this Host Interface when using kernel authentication.

ComputerSystems.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references to resources of type ComputerSystem that are connected to this HostInterface.
ComputerSystems.description: An array of references to the Computer Systems connected to this Host Interface.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Links.longDescription: The Links property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.
Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

HostInterface.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent Host Interface resources as part of the Redfish specification.
HostInterface.description: This schema defines a Host Interface resource.

title: #HostInterface.v1_1_0.HostInterface
